floodchlorinationsurvey 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

USAID Flood Response Rehabilitation and Chlorination Survey

Source: R/floodchlorinationsurvey.R
floodchlorinationsurvey.Rd

This dataset is from the USAID Flood Response Rehabilitation and Chlorination Survey, conducted between 2019 - 2020, to assess and rehabilitate flood-affected boreholes in Malawi. Using the mWater, data collectors captured detailed information on the condition of handpumps, their components, water safety risks, and the impact of chlorination and repairs. The survey was part of an emergency response initiative to restore access to safe drinking water following flood events.

Usage

floodchlorinationsurvey

Format

A tibble with 328 rows and 118 variables

submitted_on

Date when the data was submitted

water_point_name

Name of the water point

latitude

Latitude coordinate of the water point

longitude

Longitude coordinate of the water point

chlorination_rehab_date

Date chlorination or rehabilitation was conducted

community_mobilised

Indicates whether the community was mobilized for support

functional_status_before

Functional status of the water point before intervention

rating_bolts_nuts

Condition rating of bolts and nuts

rating_compression_cone

Condition rating of the compression cone

rating_cylinder

Condition rating of the cylinder

rating_flapper

Condition rating of the flapper

rating_footvalve_bobbin

Condition rating of the footvalve bobbin

rating_footvalve_body

Condition rating of the footvalve body

rating_footvalve_oring

Condition rating of the footvalve O ring

rating_fulcrum_pin

Condition rating of the fulcrum pin

rating_fulcrum_bearings

Condition rating of the fulcrum pin bush bearings

rating_handle

Condition rating of the pump handle

rating_hanger_pin

Condition rating of the hanger pin

rating_hanger_bearings

Condition rating of the hanger pin bush bearings

rating_head_bolt

Condition rating of the head bolt

rating_plunger_bobbin

Condition rating of the plunger bobbin

rating_plunger_body

Condition rating of the plunger body

rating_plunger_useal

Condition rating of the plunger U seal

rating_pump_head_case

Condition rating of the pump head case

rating_pump_head_cover

Condition rating of the pump head cover

rating_rising_main

Condition rating of the rising main pipe

rating_rising_centralisers

Condition rating of rising main centralisers

rating_rods

Condition rating of connecting rods

rating_rod_centralisers

Condition rating of rod centralisers

rating_rodhanger

Condition rating of the rod hanger

rating_rope

Condition rating of the rope

rating_socket

Condition rating of the socket

rating_steel_cone

Condition rating of the steel cone

rating_top_sleeve

Condition rating of the top sleeve

rod_count

Number of rods in the borehole

broken_parts_fished_out

Indicates whether broken parts were retrieved from the borehole

broken_parts_comments

Comments on the broken parts retrieved

silt_observed

Presence of silt on parts (Yes/No)

corrosion_observed

Presence of corrosion on parts (Yes/No)

slime_observed

Presence of slime buildup on parts (Yes/No)

rising_main_length_m

Length of the rising main pipe in meters

rope_attached

Indicates whether a rope was attached to the rising main

photos_of_removed_parts

URLs or filenames of photos showing removed parts

pedestal_condition

General condition of the pedestal

pedestal_firm

Is the pedestal held firmly in place?

photos_of_civil_work

URLs or filenames of photos showing surrounding infrastructure

latrines_within_30m

Presence of latrines within 30m of the water point

latrines_within_100m

Presence of latrines within 100m of the water point

cemetery_within_30m

Presence of cemetery within 30m

waste_dumps_within_30m

Presence of waste dumps within 30m

difficult_access_by_car

Whether the site is difficult to reach by car

chlorination_done

Indicates whether chlorination was conducted

parts_chlorinated

Indicates whether the parts were chlorinated

parts_chlorinated_unknown

TRUE if unsure whether parts were chlorinated

borehole_depth_m

Total depth of the borehole in meters

water_depth_m

Depth of water in the borehole in meters

chlorine_water_buckets

Number of 20L buckets of chlorine-treated water used

hth_dissolved_properly

Whether 1g of HTH was dissolved for every 20L of water

chlorinated_parts_installed

Were chlorinated parts reinstalled after treatment?

replaced_rising_main_length_m

Length of rising main pipe replaced (m)

replaced_rod_count

Number of rods replaced

replaced_bolts_nuts_tick

TRUE if bolts and nuts were replaced

replaced_bolts_nuts_count

Number of bolts and nuts replaced

replaced_compression_cone_tick

TRUE if compression cone was replaced

replaced_compression_cone_count

Number of compression cones replaced

replaced_cylinder_tick

TRUE if cylinder was replaced

replaced_cylinder_count

Number of cylinders replaced

replaced_flapper_tick

TRUE if flapper was replaced

replaced_flapper_count

Number of flappers replaced

replaced_footvalve_bobbin_tick

TRUE if footvalve bobbin was replaced

replaced_footvalve_bobbin_count

Number of footvalve bobbins replaced

replaced_footvalve_body_tick

TRUE if footvalve body was replaced

replaced_footvalve_body_count

Number of footvalve bodies replaced

replaced_footvalve_oring_tick

TRUE if footvalve O-ring was replaced

replaced_footvalve_oring_count

Number of O-rings replaced

replaced_fulcrum_pin_tick

TRUE if fulcrum pin was replaced

replaced_fulcrum_pin_count

Number of fulcrum pins replaced

replaced_fulcrum_bearings_tick

TRUE if fulcrum bearings were replaced

replaced_fulcrum_bearings_count

Number of fulcrum bearings replaced

replaced_handle_tick

TRUE if handle was replaced

replaced_handle_count

Number of handles replaced

replaced_hanger_pin_tick

TRUE if hanger pin was replaced

replaced_hanger_pin_count

Number of hanger pins replaced

TRUE if hanger bearings were replaced

replaced_hanger_bearings_count

Number of hanger bearings replaced

replaced_head_bolt_tick

TRUE if head bolt was replaced

replaced_head_bolt_count

Number of head bolts replaced

TRUE if plunger bobbin was replaced

replaced_plunger_bobbin_count

Number of plunger bobbins replaced

replaced_plunger_body_tick

TRUE if plunger body was replaced

replaced_plunger_body_count

Number of plunger bodies replaced

replaced_plunger_useal_tick

TRUE if plunger U-seal was replaced

replaced_plunger_useal_count

Number of U-seals replaced

replaced_pump_head_case_tick

TRUE if pump head case was replaced

replaced_pump_head_case_count

Number of pump head cases replaced

replaced_pump_head_cover_tick

TRUE if pump head cover was replaced

replaced_pump_head_cover_count

Number of pump head covers replaced

replaced_rising_main_tick

TRUE if rising main pipe was replaced

replaced_rising_main_count

Number of rising main pipes replaced

replaced_rising_centralisers_tick

TRUE if rising main centralisers were replaced

replaced_rising_centralisers_count

Number of centralisers replaced

replaced_rods_tick

TRUE if rods were replaced

replaced_rods_count

Number of rods replaced

replaced_rod_centralisers_tick

TRUE if rod centralisers were replaced

replaced_rod_centralisers_count

Number of rod centralisers replaced

replaced_rodhanger_tick

TRUE if rodhanger was replaced

replaced_rodhanger_count

Number of rodhangers replaced

replaced_rope_tick

TRUE if rope was replaced

replaced_rope_count

Number of ropes replaced

replaced_socket_tick

TRUE if socket was replaced

replaced_socket_count

Number of sockets replaced

replaced_steel_cone_tick

TRUE if steel cone was replaced

replaced_steel_cone_count

Number of steel cones replaced

replaced_top_sleeve_tick

TRUE if top sleeve was replaced

replaced_top_sleeve_count

Number of top sleeves replaced

functionality_after

Functional status of the water point after intervention

time_to_fill_20l_bucket

Time (in seconds) it took to fill a 20L bucket

strokes_to_yield_water

Number of strokes required to yield water from the pump
